argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinvinv.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpinvinv.n | |- N = ( invg ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpinv11.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_grpinvf | |- ( G e. Grp -> N : B --> B ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> N : B --> B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( N : B --> B -> N Fn B ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> N Fn B ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_grpinvcnv | |- ( G e. Grp -> `' N = N ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> `' N = N ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_fneq1d | |- ( ph -> ( `' N Fn B <-> N Fn B ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> `' N Fn B ) |
| 12 |  | #P_dff1o4 | |- ( N : B -1-1-onto-> B <-> ( N Fn B /\ `' N Fn B ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 11, 12 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> N : B -1-1-onto-> B ) |
